# David Gonzalez-Velez

> Self-taught software engineer and researcher based in Chicago, Illinois, specializing in quantum computation, full-stack development, and AI-driven applications.

## About

- Name: David Gonzalez-Velez
- Location: Chicago, Illinois
- Degree: B.S. Molecular Engineering (Quantum), University of Chicago
- Email: davidgonzalez1019@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/DGV98
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-gonzalez-velez-379049100/

## Experience

### Software Developer — SnapOn Credit (May 2025 – Present)
- Modernized legacy PICK Basic collection system for 300+ users with Python/HTML/CSS interfaces
- Built SMS delivery system replacing carrier email-to-text, handling 1,000–2,000 messages/month
- Migrated legacy platform to modern terminal emulator and API-driven architecture

### Research Assistant — Loyola University Chicago (Oct 2023 – Present)
- Built full-stack facial recognition app with React, Flask, and Vercel; implemented CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
- Improved system accuracy by 50% through Chakra UI redesign and facial embedding threshold optimization
- Led project management through stand-ups, Kanban tracking, and stakeholder collaboration

### Senior Software Engineer — Smyl Fitness (Jan 2023 – Sep 2024)
- Led 2 development teams to ship functional health screening software in 3 months
- Integrated MoveNet pose estimation, improving screening precision by 50%

## Projects

### Face Recognition
Privacy-first attendance tracker using browser-based facial recognition to count repeat visitors without storing personal data.
Tags: TypeScript, React, TensorFlow
Demo: https://community-os-7qjn.vercel.app/

### Game Hub
Game discovery app for browsing and filtering video games from a comprehensive games database.
Tags: TypeScript, React
Repo: https://github.com/DGV98/game-hub-clone
Demo: https://game-hub-tan-one.vercel.app/

### Terminal Games
Interactive ASCII games playable directly in the terminal using Python's curses library.
Tags: Python, curses
Repo: https://github.com/DGV98/term_games

### DARCH
Dotfiles for Arch Linux/Hyprland rice.
Tags: Hyprland, Arch Linux, Lua
Repo: https://github.com/DGV98/DARCH

### Summer Programs Scraper
Web scraper that aggregates summer program listings from multiple sites into one searchable database.
Tags: SQLite, Pandas, Django
Repo: https://github.com/DGV98/Scraper

## Publications

- "Characterizing Emergency Department Visits for Product-Related Head Injuries in the United States 2014 to 2024" — JACEP Open, 2025. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.acepjo.2025.100256
- "Epidemiology of emergency department visits for burn injuries in the United States, 2014–2023" — Burns, 2025. https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0305417925004310

## Skills

TypeScript, React, Python, Django, Flask, TensorFlow, Next.js, SQL, Tailwind CSS, Git, GitHub Actions, Vercel, Quantum Computing, Molecular Engineering
